tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dance_team_routines (
    routine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    routine_name VARCHAR(255),
    difficulty_level VARCHAR(50),
    choreographer VARCHAR(100),
    routine_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE formations (
    formation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    formation_name VARCHAR(100),
    formation_type VARCHAR(50),
    num_dancers INT,
    formation_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE music_playlists (
    playlist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    playlist_name VARCHAR(100),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    num_songs INT,
    playlist_description TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE DanceTeams (team_id INT PRIMARY KEY, team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, team_captain VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE Routines (routine_id INT PRIMARY KEY, routine_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, team_id INT NOT NULL, choreographer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE Formations (formation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, formation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, routine_id INT NOT NULL, formation_description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Playlists (playlist_id INT PRIMARY KEY, playlist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, routine_id INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE Songs (song_id INT PRIMARY KEY, song_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
